While a massive crowd caused chaos during his stadium appearance, leading to security concerns, fans also celebrated his legacy with a 70-foot statue unveiling. Messi's return after 14 years ignited immense enthusiasm, highlighting his enduring popularity.

title: Watch: PM Modi, leaders pay tribute on Parliament attack anniversary
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and leaders across parties paid tribute to the martyrs of the 2001 Parliament attack on its December 13 anniversary. Sonia Gandhi, Rahul Gandhi, Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, Yogi Adityanath and Nitin Gadkari honoured the fallen, remembering the security personnel who sacrificed their lives defending the nation. On December 13, 2001, five heavily armed terrorists belonging to the Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT) and Jaish-e-Mohammed (JeM) stormed the Parliament complex in New Delhi and opened fire indiscriminately. Around 14 people, including security personnel and a civilian, were killed in the attack.

title: Messi in Kolkata: Upset fans vandalise Salt Lake stadium; organiser detained; CM orders enquiry
description: CM Mamata Banerjee constitutes an enquiry committee over the incident and recommend measures to avoid such incidents in the future; fans were angry that despite buying tickets at steep prices they were not even able to catch a glimpse of Messi

description: The first dose will be administered to 27,000 children in the four districts, Health Minister Ma. Subramanian told reporters on the sidelines of an event to mark World AIDS Day on Friday

Thane snakebite case: How cops unravelled woman's death as murder after 3 years;
description: Three years after a woman's death from a snakebite was ruled accidental, police have arrested her husband and three friends, revealing a murder conspiracy. The husband allegedly orchestrated the killing due to domestic disputes, enlisting a snake rescuer friend to provide the venomous snake used in the fatal incident.

Boost for Makhana sector! Govt holds first meeting; Rs 476-crore scheme rolled out
description: The Indian government has launched a Rs 476.03 crore, six-year development program to modernize the makhana sector. This initiative, overseen by the National Makhana Board, focuses on research, quality seed production, farmer training, and enhancing value addition, branding, and export promotion across the country.

Shah Rukh Khan, son AbRam greet Lionel Messi, pose for photos amid loud cheers - Watch
description: Football legend Lionel Messi virtually unveiled his 70-foot statue in Kolkata as part of his GOAT India Tour 2025. The event, attended by Shah Rukh Khan and Luis Suárez, saw the Argentine star honored with an iron statue depicting him with the FIFA World Cup trophy.

title: Watch: ‘No big deal’: Trump shrugs off newly released Epstein photos
Delhi AQI turns 'severe': GRAP Stage III reimposed across NCR; what's allowed & what's not
description: Delhi plunged back into 'severe' air quality on Saturday, triggering Stage III restrictions across the NCR. Overnight pollution surge, driven by slow winds and stable atmosphere, pushed the AQI to 401. Authorities have intensified preventive measures as a thick smog blanket reduced visibility and worsened discomfort, urging vulnerable groups to limit outdoor exposure.

Nicki Minaj in MAGA era: Singer slams Newsom over trans rights; applauds Trump
description: Nicki Minaj has intensified her political shift to the right, criticizing California Governor Gavin Newsom's pro-trans statements. She accused him of exploiting trans children for political gain, comparing him unfavorably to J.D. Vance. This follows Minaj's previous alignment with anti-trans rhetoric from the Trump administration.

title: Abhishek Bachchan ‘won’t tolerate manufactured rubbish’ about his family, calls divorce rumours with Aishwarya ‘malicious’
Rs 3,600 crore project: Haryana ties up with World Bank to cut pollution
description: Haryana has launched its most ambitious environmental initiative, the 'Haryana Clean Air Project for Sustainable Development,' in collaboration with the World Bank, with a Rs 3,600 crore corpus. This project aims to significantly improve air quality over five years through sweeping interventions, including industrial upgrades, e-bus procurement, and enhanced monitoring infrastructure.

title: ‘Vice-captains have been dropped before’: Ex-India batter suggests to rest Shubman Gill for Sanju Samson, ‘there shouldn’t be double standards’
Watch: Trump calls resurfaced photos with Epstein 'no big deal'
description: President Trump dismissed newly released photos with Jeffrey Epstein as "no big deal," stating many people knew the convicted sex offender. House Democrats shared over 95,000 images, including those of Trump, Bill Clinton, and Bill Gates, raising questions about Epstein's network. The White House accused Democrats of politicizing the release.

title: Week after audio row, Patiala sees maximum candidates in fray in Zila Parishads
Multiple vehicles collide on Noida expressway amid dense fog; several injured
description: Dense fog on the Eastern Peripheral Expressway caused a multi-vehicle collision on Saturday morning, resulting in several injuries. Poor visibility was the primary cause of the pile-up. Emergency services responded promptly, transporting the injured to local hospitals for medical attention.

title: Delhi chokes as AQI nears ‘severe’ level
'Not surprising': Cong blames Trump-Modi ties over India not being part of Pax Silica; what is the initiative?
description: The Congress party criticised Prime Minister Modi after India's exclusion from the US-led "Pax Silica" initiative, a nine-nation effort to counter Chinese dominance in high-tech supply chains.  Party leader Jairam Ramesh cited a "sharp downturn in Trump–Modi ties" as a likely reason, questioning the government's foreign policy effectiveness despite recent calls between the leaders.

Dwyane Wade Says “I’ll Miss Him” in Emotional Tribute to LeBron James
description: Dwyane Wade, reflecting on LeBron James' 23rd NBA season, expresses admiration and a fan's perspective on an impending era's end.  He acknowledges James' elite performance, even as fans call for retirement, and cherishes their shared championship history. Wade also humorously recalls the 'Big Three' introduction, highlighting the immense pressure and difficulty of winning.

title: Parking lot shooting in Canada: 3 Indian-origin men arrested - police share footage
description: Three Indian-origin men were arrested in Brampton, Canada, following a shooting in a parking lot linked to a tow-truck dispute. Peel Regional Police identified the accused as Manjot Bhatti, Navjot Bhatti, and Amanjot Bhatti. The investigation is ongoing, with police seeking an additional suspect.

Gatecrash or misrepresentation? Did Pak PM interrupt Putin's closed-door meeting? Fact check
description: Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif faced online criticism on Friday after video alleged that he entered a closed-door meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, at the International Forum for Peace and Trust in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan. The video was later deleted, claiming that it may have been a "misrepresentation of the events".

‘Trillions rolling in’: Why Trump’s massive tariffs haven’t resolved American woes
description: President Trump touts rising government revenues and investment pledges as proof of his economic strategy's success. However, many Americans face affordability pressures, creating a disconnect between headline growth and personal finances. Critics argue that while tariffs have increased, they haven't significantly eased cost-of-living strains for households.

title: 'He won't be India's captain... ': Suryakumar Yadav gets big warning | IND vs SA
description: India's T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav is under scrutiny for a significant dip in form, having gone 20 innings without a fifty. Former batter Aakash Chopra emphasized the captain's primary role is to score runs, especially with the T20 World Cup approaching. Both Yadav and vice-captain Shubman Gill's consistent performances are deemed crucial for the team's confidence.

description: Delhi's excise department has banned firecrackers, including electric ones, in clubs, restaurants, and bars ahead of holiday festivities. This safety measure, prompted by a Goa nightclub fire, mandates functional fire-safety systems and valid NOCs for all licensed establishments. Violators face strict action, including license suspension or cancellation.

Common Indian morning habits ranked on a scale of 1 to 10; here’s the final result
Congress MP claims BJP neta was drunk during Rahul Gandhi's speech
description: A Congress MP has accused a senior BJP member of attending Lok Sabha proceedings "drunk" during Rahul Gandhi's speech on electoral reforms.  The MP cited the individual's "repeated gestures" and "tottering" as evidence, urging the BJP to prevent such incidents. This allegation follows a recent row over a TMC MP allegedly "vaping" in the House, highlighting concerns over parliamentary decorum.

title: Rajkot: Cop shoots himself dead at police commissioner office; distressed over family matters
description: An SRP constable allegedly shot himself dead with his service rifle at the Police Commissioner office in Rajkot early Friday. Preliminary investigations suggest marital discord as the cause, with a six-month-old video surfacing where the constable expressed distress over his wife leaving him and property disputes. This is the second such incident in two days involving police personnel.

title: Haryana’s English assistant professor qualifying test: Under 10% clear exam; 462 posts vacant
description: Haryana Public Service Commission's assistant professor exam in English saw a dismal pass rate, with less than 10% of candidates qualifying, leaving hundreds of posts vacant. Despite many aspirants holding PhDs and UGC-NET/JRF qualifications, the commission cited "weak written skills" for the low scores, sparking widespread protests and demands for transparency in the evaluation process.

title: Climate migration begins: Tuvaluans relocate to Australia; special visas take effect
description: Australia has welcomed the first climate migrants from Tuvalu, a Pacific nation facing inundation due to rising sea levels. A groundbreaking bilateral treaty allows Tuvaluans to live, study, and work in Australia, offering "mobility with dignity" as climate impacts worsen. This initiative marks a significant step in addressing climate-induced displacement.

title: Bihar: JD(U) backs Rohini Yadav safety plea, offers security; RJD, Lalu family remain silent
description: In a decisive move advocating for women's safety, JD(U) has extended comprehensive security measures to Rohini Acharya, daughter of Lalu Prasad, following her urgent plea. While Rohini expressed fear regarding the safety of parental homes, the RJD and the Lalu family remained notably mute on the subject.

title: Tourists visiting US to submit five years of social media history: Is it because of JD Vance memes?
Video of Pakistan PM Shehbaz Sharif gatecrashing Putin–Erdogan meet viral: Is it real?
description: Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif reportedly "gatecrashed" a meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan after waiting over 40 minutes. This incident occurred as Sharif continues efforts to strengthen ties with Moscow, despite acknowledging Russia's close partnership with India.

title: Nvidia chip sales to China: Senator sends warning; claims Trump selling national security
description: Senator Elizabeth Warren has strongly criticized President Trump's decision to permit Nvidia's sale of advanced AI chips to China, labeling it a betrayal of American national security. She insists Nvidia's CEO and Commerce Secretary must testify. Nvidia defends the move, claiming it prevents foreign competitors from gaining ground and benefits the US economy.

title: Brittany Mahomes breaks silence with yellow post as Patrick faces tough week
description: Following a tough 20-10 loss to the Texans, Brittany Mahomes' game-day fashion took center stage. Her striking yellow coat, shared with a simple emoji caption and turned-off comments, became a symbol of hope and quiet strength amidst the Kansas City Chiefs' challenging season. This subtle display offered a message of support and resilience.

title: Who Is Sherrone Moore’s Wife Kell Moore? Ex-Michigan HC’s Family and Kids
description: University of Michigan football coach Sherrone Moore has been fired after allegations of an inappropriate relationship with a staff member. Athletic Director Warde Manuel confirmed the decision, citing a violation of university policy. Moore's wife, Kelli, and their three daughters are now under public scrutiny as the family navigates this unexpected controversy.

title: Meet your teeth’s invisible shield: Why enamel care matters most
description: Many Indians are unknowingly risking their teeth's natural shield, enamel, due to common habits like harsh brushing and acidic diets. This vital outer layer, crucial for preventing cavities and sensitivity, cannot regenerate once worn down.
